name: native-messaging-host
description: Native messaging host application for local filesystem links webextension.

scripts.build:win32: npm run clean:win32 && npm run createExe:win32 && npm run compileInstaller:win32
scripts.build:linux: npm run clean:linux && npm run createExe:unix && npm run bundleInstaller:linux
scripts.create-coverage:python: cd ./locallinkmessaging_host/locallinkmessaging && (echo \x00{"url": "file://c:/", "reveal": false, "exeAllowed": false} | coverage run locallinkmessaging.py)
